Description: {{PageRef|Other|alt_name=General Change}}s
* Playtesting times are now starting 1 hour earlier. Weekdays are 5PM PDT and weekends are 3PM PDT.
* Added in-game custom item builds support. Create your own builds or browse builds from the community in the heroes page.
* Added post game player reporting option
* Ally player glow-through-world silhouette now communicates their current health
* Added ambient music track
* Added unique {{PageRef|Haze}} footstep sound effects
* Fixed various issues with mic audio input and lag it introduced
* Small adjustments to how the crosshair UI area looks
* Mic input device is now selected from in-game settings rather than the steam client
* Improved various networking and hit registration related issues (this was released a couple days ago)
* Updated {{PageRef|Trooper}} and {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}} shooting sound effects
* Various improvements to damage audio clarity for victims and attackers
* Sped up select {{PageRef|Amber Hand}} VO that related to game state (shrines being under attack, protecting the {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=urn}} runner etc)
* Adding game audio muted indicator in top left if the game is muted
* Camera can now be moved while the game is paused in replays
* Fixed the {{PageRef|Rejuvenator}} falling during pause
* Fixed the {{PageRef|Soul Urn|alt_name=Idol}} falling during pause
* Fixed the bottom most {{PageRef|Shop|alt_name=shop}} items having part of their icon be unclickable
* Fixed a few unit target abilities that could sometimes select a target behind a nearby wall (e.g. {{PageRef|Bebop}} {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}})
* Added some additional visual tells for the receiving end of {{PageRef|Lash}}’s {{PageRef|Death Slam}}
* Updated Bullet Shredder debuff effects
* {{PageRef|Mid-Boss}} is now invulnerable if there are no enemies it can actually attack
* Fixed your active items not hiding in the UI when you are dead and spectating a team mate
* Added support for binding mouse1 and mouse2 to any key (this was released a couple days ago)
* Fixed various movement stuck bugs with {{PageRef|Ivy}}
* Added alt info to recent damage view to make it clearer that this can be brought up again after it disappears
* Improved {{PageRef|Vindicta}}’s {{PageRef|Stake}} effects to make it a little clearer when you are affected
* Fixed upgrading {{PageRef|McGinnis}}’s {{PageRef|Medicinal Specter}} to T3 while active causing it to heal everyone to full instantly
* Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{PageRef|Paradox}} {{PageRef|Pulse Grenade}}’s pulses to go off at once
* Fixed {{PageRef|Kelvin}}’s Ice Beam sometimes not hitting {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s
* Fixed being able to see some things through the {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=Veil}}s in the map that you shouldn’t be able to see
* Removed stack of cardboard boxes inside connection hallway near bases to prevent cover from {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s
* Fixed getting stuck under stair at inner lanes near {{PageRef|Guardian}}
* Fixed {{PageRef|Abrams}} getting stuck on department store facade when using his ult
* {{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} side materials tint color changed to white
* {{PageRef|Sapphire Hand|alt_name=Sapphire}} side street materials changed to new asphalt blend
* Added new slide and reload animation for {{PageRef|Wraith}}
* Out of combat run animation variants now only play during sprint state
* Fixed missing VO for {{PageRef|Yamato}} ability use/upgrades
* Allies now compliment teammates when they see impressive use of channeled abilities (for instance, Gigawatt killing three people with {{PageRef|Storm Cloud}})
* Adjusted timing of select {{PageRef|Abrams}} impact lines to time with either the rise of his leap or the descent accordingly
* Improved visibility of {{PageRef|Seven}}’s bullet and travel path
* Improved visibility of {{PageRef|Paradox}}’s bullet and travel path
* Improved visibility of {{PageRef|Wraith}}’s bullet and travel path
* Improved visibility of {{PageRef|Haze}}’s bullet and travel path
* Improved visibility of {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}’s bullet and travel path
* Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{PageRef|Seven}}’s {{PageRef|Gun|alt_name=gun}}
* Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{PageRef|Paradox}}’s {{PageRef|Gun|alt_name=gun}}
* Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{PageRef|Wraith}}’s {{PageRef|Gun|alt_name=gun}}
{{PageRef|Other|alt_name=Misc Gameplay}} Changes
* Adjusted map around the middle lanes to have an area with {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=Veil}}s for laning
* Hero kill bounty ratio between Killer and Assister reduced from 2.75x to 2.55x (means slightly more to the Assister)
* Spirit scaling reduced by ~15% (the total effective Spirit damage is reduced by less than this, this is just the Spirit multiplier scaling portion and has largest impact on late game burst)
* Unclaimed {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=souls}} now convert 10% slower
* {{PageRef|Sinner's Sacrifice|alt_name=Vault}}s base bounty increased from 220 to 260
* Strong {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s Spirit Resist increased from 25% to 35%
* Medium {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s Spirit Resist increased from 25% to 30%
* Starting at 15 minutes, one {{PageRef|Melee|alt_name=melee}} {{PageRef|Trooper}} per wave will spawn with 1.75x health
* Medic {{PageRef|Trooper}} health increased from 240 to 260
* Sidelane {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=Veil}}s near {{PageRef|Guardian}}s are now one-way visibility (used to be blocked visibility in both directions)
* {{PageRef|Denizen|alt_name=Neutral}}s can now lean side to side to fire when obstructed by map geometry and being attacked
* {{PageRef|Zipline}} Boost ability speed increased from 100% to 130%
* {{PageRef|Zipline}} Boost ability ramp time to reach max speed reduced from 2s to 1s
* {{PageRef|Zipline}} base speed boost after {{PageRef|Base Guardian}}s are killed increased from 100% to 120%
* {{PageRef|Zipline}} base speed boost's ramp time after {{PageRef|Base Guardian}}s are killed reduced from 5s to 4s
* Being Disarmed no longer prevents you from reloading
Item Gameplay Changes
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}: Cooldown reduced from 14s to 9s
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}}: No longer has +50 Health
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}}: Now grants +75 Spirit Shield
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}}: Now grants +0.7 HP regen
* {{PageRef|Mystic Burst}}: No longer has +1 HP Regen
* {{PageRef|Mystic Burst}}: Now grants +1 Sprint
* {{PageRef|Mystic Burst}}: Cooldown reduced from 8s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Moved from T3 to T2
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Duration reduced 5s to 3.5s
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Cooldown increased from 25s to 40s
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Bullet Resist reduced from 25% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Cast range reduced from 20m to 15m
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Cooldown increased from 22s to 27s
* {{PageRef|Slowing Hex}}: Range increased from 30 to 35
* {{PageRef|Reactive Barrier}}: Cooldown reduced from 40s to 35s
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}}: Bullet Shield increased from 275 to 300
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}}: Weapon Damage while Shielded from 20% to 24%
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}: Now requires that shotguns middle pellet hit the target
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: Now displays its current number of charges on its active icon
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Moved from T2 to T3
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Health increased from 50 to 75
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Spirit Amp increased from 8% to 12%
* Shifting Shroud: Cooldown reduced from 70s to 55s
* Shifting Shroud: Duration 2.5s to 2.75s
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Duration of no damage taken requirement reduced from 5s to 4s
* {{PageRef|Majestic Leap}}: Now gives +75 Health
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}}: Flat portion of the lifesteal increased from 90 to 110
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Spirit bonus reduced from 6 to 5
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Now grants +2 Sprint
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Stun duration starts after hitting the ground
* {{PageRef|Superior Cooldown}}: HP regen reduced from 6 to 4
* {{PageRef|Escalating Resilience}}: Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
* {{PageRef|Improved Burst}}: Damage reduced from 11% Max HP to 10%
* {{PageRef|Frenzy}}: When below 40% HP you now gain 25% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Curse}}: Ammo increased from 15% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Refresher}}: Now grants +10% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Glass Cannon}}: Fire Rate reduced from 15% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Silencer}}: Now provides 15% Ammo
* {{PageRef|Leech}}: Spirit bonus reduced from 12 to 8
* {{PageRef|Phantom Strike}}: Damage reduced from 200 to 150
Hero Gameplay Changes
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Siphon Life}} T1 and T2 swapped
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Shoulder charge now allows for a bit more steering control
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Sticky Bomb}} T3 changed from Silence to Disarm
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Improved {{PageRef|Hook}} hitbox detection to not grab targets that are behind cover
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: Hyperbeam width increased from 2.5m to 2.7m
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: Base {{PageRef|Gun|alt_name=gun}} damage reduced from 18 to 15
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Gun}} damage growth reduced from +1.1 to +0.8
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} Spirit scaling reduced from 2.2 to 1.2
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} T3 changed from +200 damage to "Kills enemy heroes below 20%". Low health enemies are highlighted while guiding the owl.
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} no longer breaks invisibility when cast (previously was part of the T3)
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} Spirit scaling increased from 2.3 to 2.6
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} no longer gets +140 damage with the T3
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} T3 is now "-30% Damage Penalty On Victim for 4s after wakeup"
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} cast time increased from 0.7s to 0.8s
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} evasion from 70% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} T2 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} Replicated Healing increased from 50% to 65%
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} Fire Rate reduced from 20% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Watcher's Covenant}} T1 changed to +15% Rate
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Frost Grenade}} cooldown reduced from 26s to 23s
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: While {{PageRef|Ice Path}}ing you no longer slow down when you shoot your {{PageRef|Gun|alt_name=gun}}
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} Channel move speed increased from 4 to 6
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} T1 changed from "+2 Channel Move Speed" to -8s Cooldown
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Soul Exchange}} cast time reduced from 0.65s to 0.5s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Malice}} clipping aggressively against map geometry edges
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: Base Stamina increased from 2 to 3
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} base Damage Per Meter reduced from 8 to 6
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: Fixed some cases with {{PageRef|Ground Strike}} not hitting units positioned just below the impact zone
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Flog}} angle increased from 20 degrees to 30 degrees
* {{PageRef|Lash}}: {{PageRef|Flog}} cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: Fixed certain rooftops allowing turrets to be built on them
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Scorn}} healing against non-heroes reduced from 1x to 0.7x
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: Sandblast no longer prevents enemies from reloading while disarmed
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Kinetic Carbine}} Max Damage Amp reduced from 125% to 100%
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Paradox}}ical Swap range reduced from 45m to 40m
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} T3 added, now heals {{PageRef|Pocket}} for 100% of its damage (33% vs non-heroes)
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: Fixed some issues with {{PageRef|Barrage}} projectiles getting caught on map geometry
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Flying Cloak}} pathing improved, it will no longer bounce erratically off map geometry
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} T3 reduced from +4m/s to +3m/s
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Crow Familiar}} T3 improved from -30% Healing Suppression to -40%
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Alchemical Flask}} travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Royal Flush}} no longer has a cast delay
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Royal Flush}} time to spawn cards increased from 0.4s to 0.6s
* {{PageRef|Wraith}}: {{PageRef|Telekinesis}} no longer allows the victim to shoot back
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: Shadow Explosion renamed to {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} and reworked into a new ability
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} no longer has radius impact behavior

* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} now gives you 4.5s of invulnerability after the initial 2s invulnerable channel period. You transform and refresh your abilities, improving ability speeds by 60% and gaining unlimited ammo. "{{PageRef|Ability}} Speeds" affects {{PageRef|Power Slash}} cast time, {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} flying time, and {{PageRef|Crimson Slash}} cast time.
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} cooldown increased from 90s to 100s
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} T2 is now +4 m/s during Shadow Form
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} T3 is now +1s duration
